name: travel_agency_ui.py
content:
Here is a basic example of how you might structure this application using the Streamlit library in Python. This code creates a sidebar with date pickers for selecting a range of dates, and a text input for entering a location. The main window just displays the chosen dates and location.

```python
import streamlit as st
from datetime import date

st.title('Travel Agency')

# Sidebar
st.sidebar.header('Plan Your Trip')
start_date = st.sidebar.date_input('Start date', date.today())
end_date = st.sidebar.date_input('End date', date.today())
location = st.sidebar.text_input('Location', 'Enter here')

# Main window
st.header('Your Trip Details')
st.write('Start date:', start_date)
st.write('End date:', end_date)
st.write('Location:', location)
```

To run this application, you would save the code to a Python script, then run the script using Streamlit. For example, if you save the code to a script
